snippet: A cruise ship that was docking rocked the Growler, an exhibit at the Intrepid Sea, Air and Space Museum.
abstract: Wake from a Norwegian Cruise Line ship, docking at a Hudson River pier, damages gangway at the Intrepid Sea, Air and Space Museum leading to the Growler, a long-decommissioned submarine.
lead_paragraph: A cruise ship that was docking rocked the Growler, an exhibit at the Intrepid Sea, Air and Space Museum.

headline.seo: Cruise Ship Damages Gangway to Growler Submarine at Intrepid Museum
headline.main: Ship’s Wake Damages Gangway at Museum
headline.print_headline: Ship’s Wake Damages Gangway At Museum
